doc:
Isabelle De Funès https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isabelle_De_Fun%C3%A8s 0 Isabelle Christine Inès Léonore Girard (born July 27, 1944), better known by the name Isabelle De Funès, is a French actress, singer, model and photographer. She is best known for her portrayal of Guido Crepax's comic book character Valentina in the erotic thriller, Baba Yaga (1973). Isabelle_Christine_Inès_Léonore_Girard ( born July_27_,_1944 ) , better_known by the_name_Isabelle_De_Funès , is a_French_actress , singer_,_model_and_photographer . She is_best_known for her_portrayal of Guido_Crepax 's_comic_book_character_Valentina in the_erotic_thriller , Baba_Yaga_(_1973_) .
